execution.base_executor

Module Contents

Classes

BaseExecutor

Base executor class defining partial execution stages
class execution.base_executor.BaseExecutor

Base executor class defining partial execution stages

_get_execution_num(self)
stage_prepare_data(self, read_head)

Execute data preparation stage. Load test, train and validation .csv files into pandas data frames.

Parameters

read_head – bool, read only 5 rows from test, train and val data frame

:return dict of train, test, validation pandas data frames

stage_analyze_data(self, data_dict, display)

Execute analyze data stage. Display label map, amount of class labels in test, train and validation data frame, and plot 5x5 images from each dataframe.

Parameters

  • data_dict – dict of train, test, validation pandas data frames

  • display – bool type, display output (images, plots etc.)

stage_load_data(self, data_dict)

Execute load data stage. Load test, train and validation data into memory.

Parameters

data_dict – dict of train, test, validation pandas data frames

Returns

dict of test, train and validation data

stage_test_saved_networks(self, data, networks_to_test, plot_probability)

Function to load and test all networks created by app.

Parameters

  • data – dict of test, train and validation data to be used in training

  • networks_to_test – list of networks to be tested, if empty list is provided, test all saved networks

  • plot_probability – bool to define if class probability heatmap should be displayed

Returns

dict of networks

stage_analyze_saved_networks(self)

Function to load and display analysis all networks created by app.

stage_nn_init(self, nn_topology, input_shape, optimizer, loss_function, metrics)

Execute neural network initialization stage. Create network object and compile the network.

Parameters

  • nn_topology – str topology name to be used

  • input_shape – tuple of three integers

  • optimizer – tf optimizer to be used for network compilation

  • loss_function – tf loss function to be used for network compilation

  • metrics – list of metrics to be measured for network

Returns

initialized network model

stage_nn_train(self, cnn_model: src.nn_library.network.Neural_network, data, epochs)

Execute network training stage.

Parameters

  • cnn_model – object of type src.nn_library.network.Neural_network

  • data – dict of test, train and validation data to be used in training

  • epochs – number of training iterations

stage_nn_test(self, cnn_model: src.nn_library.network.Neural_network, data, plot_probability)

Execute network testing stage.

Parameters

  • cnn_model – object of type src.nn_library.network.Neural_network

  • data – dict of test, train and validation data to be used in training

  • plot_probability – bool to define if class probability heatmap should be displayed

stage_nn_save(self, save_dir, network_name, cnn_model: src.nn_library.network.Neural_network)

Execute save network stage. Save network in given dir with given name in .pb format.

Parameters

  • save_dir – str where network model will be saved in .pb format

  • network_name – str name of saved network

  • cnn_model – object of type src.nn_library.network.Neural_network

stage_run_sat_img_classifier(self, sat_img_list, network_name)

Initialize SatelliteImageClassifier object and perform land use classification on given list of satellite images.

Parameters

  • sat_img_list – list of str names of satellite images to be used

  • network_name – str name of network to be used for land use classification on given sat image
